Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 4 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Scimitar, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 5 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Sleep Gaze, The Jackalwere gazes at one creature, attempting to hypnotize them into a magical slumber

Abilities.Ability 1: Shapechanger, The Jackalwere can use its action to polymorph into a specific human or a jackal-humanoid hybrid, or back into its true form

Damage Immunities.Damage 1: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing fron nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
